biotools.summary: Quadruplex forming G-Rich Sequences (QGRS) Mapper searches nucleotide sequences for the presence of G-quartet motifs.  QGRS Mapper allows you to view the distribution and composition of QGRS in the context of alternatively spliced isoforms of your gene.

bioschemas.name: QGRS Mapper
bioschemas.summary: Quadruplex forming G-Rich Sequences (QGRS) Mapper searches nucleotide sequences for the presence of G-quartet motifs.  QGRS Mapper allows you to view the distribution and composition of QGRS in the context of alternatively spliced isoforms of your gene.
